vsbackground.description: Define a background image for each area.
vsbackground.showType.full: Display background image in full screen
vsbackground.full.img: Full-screen background image URL, effective when the display area is set to full-screen mode
vsbackground.full.opacity: Full-screen background image opacity, ranging from fully transparent 0 to opaque 1, recommended 0.1
vsbackground.titlebar.img: Menu bar background image URL, effective when the display area is set to area mode
vsbackground.titlebar.opacity: Menu bar background image opacity, ranging from fully transparent 0 to opaque 1, recommended 0.1
vsbackground.banner.img: Banner background image URL, effective when the display area is set to area mode
vsbackground.banner.opacity: Banner background image opacity, ranging from fully transparent 0 to opaque 1, recommended 0.1
vsbackground.activitybar.img: Activity bar background image URL, effective when the display area is set to area mode
vsbackground.activitybar.opacity: Activity bar background image opacity, ranging from fully transparent 0 to opaque 1, recommended 0.1
vsbackground.sidebar.img: Main sidebar background image URL, effective when the display area is set to area mode
vsbackground.sidebar.opacity: Main sidebar background image opacity, ranging from fully transparent 0 to opaque 1, recommended 0.1
vsbackground.editor.img: Editor background image URL, effective when the display area is set to area mode
vsbackground.editor.opacity: Editor background image opacity, ranging from fully transparent 0 to opaque 1, recommended 0.1
vsbackground.panel.img: Panel background image URL, effective when the display area is set to area mode
vsbackground.panel.opacity: Panel background image opacity, ranging from fully transparent 0 to opaque 1, recommended 0.1
vsbackground.auxiliarybar.img: Auxiliary sidebar background image URL, effective when the display area is set to area mode
vsbackground.auxiliarybar.opacity: Auxiliary sidebar background image opacity, ranging from fully transparent 0 to opaque 1, recommended 0.1
vsbackground.statusbar.img: Status bar background image URL, effective when the display area is set to area mode
vsbackground.statusbar.opacity: Status bar background image opacity, ranging from fully transparent 0 to opaque 1, recommended 0.1
